arts.ttl: Fenerbahce and Mourinho in talks for Serie A defender – report
arts.sum: Turkish media Takvim reports that José Mourinho’s Fenerbahce are interested in Fiorentina defender Cristiano Biraghi...

arts.ttl: Ryan Kent offered career lifeline as ex Rangers star looks to put Fenerbahce ordeal behind him
arts.sum: However, the Gers boss did admit that he tried to lure Kent to Club Brugge before he joined Rangers. Get the latest news sent straight to your messages by joining our Rangers WhatsApp community today.

arts.ttl: Sunday's Turkish Super Lig predictions including Fenerbahce vs. Sivasspor
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's Turkish Super Lig fixtures, including Fenerbahce vs. Sivasspor.

arts.ttl: Jose Mourinho discovers punishment for furious rant at referees as Fenerbache boss slammed
arts.sum: Jose Mourinho was left furious despite Fenerbahce's win over Trabzonspor last week, with the Portuguese coach launching a typically eviscerating rant towards the refereeing team
